content: I have a tracker to add some Task examples to the spec. Is anybody using Task and care to share a use case and an example resource that I can add to the specification?

I am working on adding example use cases for the transport patterns on the Workflow page, which (I hope) will lead to having example resource for these use cases. Task examples will be vary valuable there as well
@Eric Haas exersize at https://fhir-drills.github.io/sam-fhir-journey.html makes use of Task

Thanks Vadim ...do I have permission to use in the FHIR STU specification.. ie it will be public domain. Also you have the DiagnosticRequest in Task.input it should be in Task.focus as this is what the request is about. input is for other inputs that may be needed to complete the task like specimen
@Angus Millar can you have a look?
Ok Vadim, it's good input from Eric, I will try and get to updating FhirDrills and move the DiagnosticReport to the Task.focus
